metadata.title: CVE-2017-7476 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Gnulib before 2017-04-26 has a heap-based buffer overflow with the TZenvironment variable. The error is in the save_abbr function in time_rz.c.

criterions.comment: gnulib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
